summary: A close friendship between two crew teammates is tested when one slowly discovers he's gay and attracted to the other.
cast: Robert Stadlober|Kostja Ullmann|Jürgen Tonkel|Miriam Morgenstern|Alicja Bachleda|Angelika Brennfleck|Josefine Müller|Joseph M'Barek|Tristano Casanova|Roman Storm|Jeff Fischer|Johannes Franke|Anton Rattinger|Gerhard Oberwetter|Tobias van Dieken|Elisabeth Hart|Alexa Maria Surholt|Hanno Koffler|Marlon Kittel|Michael Wiesner|Benjamin Vilzmann|Ludwig Blochberger|Anna-Maria Hihn|Laura Maire
title: Tormenta de verano
